== Classroom Sessions ==

'''Do not edit this page before discussion with <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/phillw | the current co-ordinater]]</nowiki>.'''

This area is for setting up and coordinating our classroom sessions, please read <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Classroom | Classroom]]</nowiki> for details as to how they work. If you either wish to help out on classroom sessions, or want to request a new one, please have a read of <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Activities/Classroom/Instructors | QA Team Instructors ]]</nowiki> and then please <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QATeam/Contact | contact us]]</nowiki>. 

When a classroom session has been held, the logs of the classroom can be reviewed by clicking on its title, once it appears in ''red''.

-----
